name: In The Night (ThomasJackson)
description:
A traveler is lost in the night… Help him find his way by navigating the apps on his phone, but don’t lose battery or you won’t survive the night.

This game was created in 4 days for Ludum Dare 50's extra category. It's my first game jam/release, so I hope you enjoy!

Controls:

move left: a | move right: d | interact: e | jump: spacebar | use phone: left click

pull out phone: press the top of the phone

put phone away: press the bottom of the phone
